thread.title: Gucci Mane’s Autobiography Is Now Available to Pre-Order
thread.title_full: Gucci Mane’s Autobiography Is Now Available to Pre-Order

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Gucci Mane’s Autobiography Is Now Available to Pre-Order
text:
Since being released from prison , you’ll be hard-pressed to find a harder working man in the music industry than Gucci Mane. In following up on multiple projects , Guwop is now setting his sights on the publishing world as he will soon be delivering his autobiography.
Courtesy of publishing house Simon & Schuster, The Autobiography of Gucci Mane is set to arrive in September of this year. In a recent interview with collaborator Marilyn Manson for his CR Men’s Book cover story, Gucci revealed that he began writing the book during this three-year bid in an Indiana federal penitentiary.
“When I was locked up and they put me in the hole, this is what I was doing to keep my sanity. This is how I was protecting myself,” he told Manson.
The Autobiography of Gucci Mane was written with Neil Martinez-Belkin, as you can pre-order your copy today. The book is due out on September 19.
I'm an author now #TheAutobiographyOfGuccimane pic.twitter.com/vIGPMzQcOQ 
— Gucci Mane (@gucci1017) March 20, 2017
